column4: I have this key on my laptop that's like the wireless key or something, if i click it, the wireless connection disconnects and if i click it again it connecgts. Anyway it has a little light on it, and it keeps flashing red and white.
i wonder if it's noral to flash or if it's supposed to be always white.
Same thing happens to me, except it's bule and red
is it like white is down and red is up or something?
it's not like a steady thing it sort of is a blink that seems to mean it's doing something.
sometimes it's steady and sometimes it's blinking ike it looks like it's really working, if you get me.
One sec will do some research on that and ping you
What version of ubuntu do you have?
It's normal, just that when data is bieng transferred, like when you're loading a page it blinks
I know it is a little annoying
it's not too bad, annoying wise, i just got curious. Yeah it's mildly annoying if i think about it :) but i usually do not.
